title: What's the fuss over the Illuminati? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are being cast more ‘into the light’ from their ‘shadow government’ positions due in part to the policies of President Trump, Brexit and events concerning the vatican (scandal, carbon tax, political interference). The ‘fuss’ is they are the biggest threat to your existence.

Dan Brown's Davinci Code, illuminated the Illuminati to me. Idk. People are intrigued by what's hidden. Secret Societies, extraterrestrials, or anything that is cloaked in deceptiveness meant to be unnoticed, but when is seen, only inspires intrigue. Do secret Societies exist? I don't doubt it…..
